appName: Moon Portal: Plank Walk Thrill Simulator
displayName: Moon Portal: Plank Walk Thrill Simulator
display_name: Moon Portal: Plank Walk Thrill Simulator
display_long_description:
# **This app is the ultimate all-in-one experience for VR newbies! Explore plank walking and immersive environments like never before.** 

# **Major Update**: 
Rebranded as **Moon Portal** with **Skywalk** experience!
- Skywalk: Challenge your fear of heights in this thrilling new feature.
- Made for Meta Quest, Moon Portal (formerly Moon VR Home) lets you step through portals, traveling to new environments and creating your perfect VR home.

Will you live on a spaceship, in a winter resort, or a sun-soaked villa? With Moon Portal, the possibilities are endless.

# Unlock all-in-one Moon Portal with:
- **Skywalk**: Test your fear of height.
- **Mixed Reality Portal**: Step into any virtual world from your room.
- **8K AI Skybox**: Create custom UHD skyboxes with text descriptions.
- **30,000+ Skybox Gallery**: Browse and save skyboxes instantly, no sideloading needed.
- **Custom Home Environments**: Explore environments created by artists worldwide (Developer Mode required).
- **Customize Your Home**: Personalize with your own files.
- **Immerse & Explore**: 360° Preview Environments where you can freely move and explore, before downloading.
- **Wireless Installation**: Download and install environments directly to your Quest.

IMPORTANT: You'll receive 5 generation quotas with your initial download. Additional quotas can be obtained with in-app purchase.

# Welcome to join our Discord: 
https://discord.gg/3wKdfqUydY
